mapper.select: select m.id, m.name, a.anNum, a.nick, a.anTitle, a.likeCount, a.anCheck, a.anDel from member m, anoFeed a where m.nick=a.nick

insert.if: insert into anoFeed(anNum, anTitle, anContent, nick, anDate, anDel, anCheck, likeCount, replyCount) values (#{anNum} , #{anTitle}, #{anContent }, #{nick }, sysdate, 'n', #{anCheck}, 0, 0)

mapper.select: select * from anoFeed where nick = #{nick } and anDate = (select max(anDate) from anoFeed where nick=#{nick})
select * from anoFeed where nick in ${nick} order by anNum desc
select * from anoFeed order by anNum desc
select * from anoFeed where anNum in (select anNum from hashTag where tag=#{tag} ) and nick in ${nick} order by anNum desc
mapper.update: update anoFeed set anDel='y' where anNum=#{anNum}
update anoFeed set anDel='n' where anNum=#{anNum}
mapper.select: select * from anoFeed where nick=#{nick} order by anNum desc
mapper.update: update anoFeed set likeCount = likeCount + 1 where anNum = #{anNum }
update anoFeed set likeCount = likeCount - 1 where anNum = #{anNum }
mapper.select: select likeCount from anoFeed where anNum = #{anNum }
mapper.update: update anoFeed set replyCount = replyCount + 1 where anNum = #{anNum }
mapper.select: select replyCount from anoFeed where anNum = #{anNum}
mapper.update: update anoFeed set replyCount = replyCount - 1 where anNum = #{anNum }
update anoFeed set anTitle = #{anTitle}, anContent = #{anContent}, photo = #{photo }, anCheck = #{anCheck } where anNum = #{anNum }
